pages.text: A strange noise, a peculiar message, and a giant beam of light from the sky...$(p)All signs point to an incursion from an Apothic Invader!

pages.title: Spawn Mechanics
pages.text: Apothic Invaders may rarely show up on the surface where mobs can normally spawn.$(p)Their arrival will be marked by a loud noise, a status message, and a beacon beam.$(p)Invaders may become more or less common depending on World Tier and Dimension.

pages.title: Invader Rarities
pages.text: Each Invader has a rarity, which is indicated by their name and outline color.$(p)Higher rarity invaders will be stronger, but drop better loot as a result.

pages.title: Loot
pages.text: Invaders are guaranteed to drop a $(l:apotheosis:adventure/mobs/invader_items)special affix item$(), and may have additional bonus loot tables beyond their normal mob counterparts.$(p)They also have a higher likelihood of dropping Gems.
